messages.title: Black Blade
messages.body: Leap to the Husks and show them who's Ghost Boss Material with the darkest of dark... blade of blades! A large sword with moderate damage and high impact is yours for the taking.

messages.title: Hexsylvania
messages.body: Go on your next great Venture in the Hexsylvania Zone! Commanders can re-experience leveling and resource progression as they climb to the top of each new Ventures Season!

messages.title: Fortnitemares Llama
messages.body: Filled to the brim with Haunted Heroes and weaponry!
